questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: If I had one million euro, I don't know what I would do with all that money. That's too much. May be, I would take my baggage and I would travel around de world to discover people and nature. I would like to visit South America, specially Patagonia and Perou. I would stay for a long time into places I love. I think also of Venice and Roma.
I'm sure, I would give money to my two children Pierre and Caroline. They are young and need some help to buy a appartment.
I'm also sure, I would help some association like MSF or Amnesty International.
But, If I had,... That's a dream ....
